warnings: WARNINGS: If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health care professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Store in a cool, dry place.
dosage_administration: DIRECTIONS: 10 drops orally, 3 times a day. Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age.
indications: INDICATIONS: For temporary relief of fever with digestive symptoms, muscular aches and pains associated with the flu.
